name: Zombie Drift: Smashy road trip
description:
Do the drift and smash hundreds of zombies! What could be better than crushing a couple of zombies in the morning driving a sportcar or a military tank?

This is an Apocalypse! Zombies and terrible mutants flooded the city, and you need to break through them. I know that you are already an experienced zombie fighter, so you don't have to hurry. Just smash as many zombies as you can.

Fit into turns, crush different creatures and use big variety of weapons! We have SUPER BONUSES for you:

- The electric bomb. will destroy all the creatures around the machine !
- Сhainsaw - Wings !
- Bait for zombies and other powerful things for your ride

FEATURES:

- Smash hordes of zombies !
- Show your drift skills !
- Unlock the new weapons !
- Choose your car or TANK!
- Save the city from the invasion of zombies and other things !

Move as quickly as possible and crash into the crowds of these awful rebel monsters! Train your driving and survival skills, it's a zombie apocalypse!
Become the best in this race for survival and show everyone that you are a master!

Write your comments, and we will make the game even better!
Have fun !
